# jest/no-mocks-import <Badge type="info" text="Style" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

This rule reports imports from a path containing a **mocks** component.

### Example

```javascript
import thing from "./__mocks__/index";
require("./__mocks__/index");
require("__mocks__");
```
